name: Swamps of Doom!
description:
Swamps of Doom is a short 2D Platform game.
Survive 4 levels to reach the end and get the Gem!
Speed run it, or Collect all the coins, or just try to win!

WASD or Arrow Keys to move around
Spacebar to jump
Left mouse button to shoot (that sword swipe is deadly! :P)

Most Art Assets from - https://craftpix.net/freebies/free-swamp-game-tileset-pixel-art/

Font - https://www.dafont.com/komika-boo.font?l[]=10&l[]=1&text=12345

Music - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/free-music-and-sfx-collection-...
